ValidationRule.description: Date of Treatment 4 or Month of Treatment 4 must be entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Date_Treated_5__c ), ISBLANK( Treatment_5_MM_YYYY_If_No_Exact_Date__c ), Not( ISBLANK( Physician_Name_5__c )), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Short_Term_Disability" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CL-036 Either Date Treated #5 or Treatment#5 MM/YYYY must be entered
